content: One picture is still worth a thousand words … Bill O’Leary nailed it! Applause for David Fahrenthold’s dogged, objective reporting and a Shout Out for Brilliance to Bill O’Leary for his photo illustration that, in one fell swoop, foreshadows an eerie, not-so-futuristic city-scape. (Hint: just how many Trumps do you see in that illustration and, could that be Putin standing slightly off center to the left?)
